tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor doesn't seem friendly and didn't explained things well. *** *** **** ******* **** ***** **** *** ********** she was like- "u can take medicines form us. we will take the blood sample and give u the report, don't go any other lab for checkup, take the medicines from her clinic only etc."
she has given us about 2mins only while there was no other patient waiting.
reply_text: Have seen your Prescription and no doctor can do such thorough check up within two minutes. I never force any patient for taking medicines or getting lab tests done from our centre.  Wish you good health always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I read the reviews on Practo and decided to go for Dr Walia. However, our experience was not good at all. A typical doctor friendliness was missing. When I tried to join my wife during consultation she asked me to stay outside in what sounded like a rough tone. Even the whole consultation with my Wife was not very satisfying. All the time it seemed like Dr Walia was trying to figure out the issue. She has a long experience *** ***** ** ****** *** **** *** **** ** *** **** Nevertheless, we have decided not to consult with her again after this experience.
reply_text:
Appreciate your effort and time to post a feedback.
Would like to address your concerns here:-
Due to the ongoing pandemic the Doctor allows only the patient into her chamber.
Patientâ€™s attendant is allowed to have a conversation with the doctor after the consultation is over. 
Sincere Apologies if you felt that the Doctorâ€™s tone wasnâ€™t polite though the Doctor never speaks in a rude manner with any Patient.
The Doctor has to go through everything in detail without hurrying and advise the patient accordingly.
Doctor has to correlate the patientâ€™s ultrasound and other report findings to reach a conclusion and start the treatment accordingly.
Hope have been able to address the concerns raised by you.

Thank you
Regards
Dr Walia

review: Dr. Neelam is honestly a good doctor of any kind that I have ever had the pleasure of seeing.  She is so intuitive, understanding, kind. I never felt rushed or pressured. I also felt extremely comfortable with her in every way. We were fortunate to have her as our doctor for multiple pregnancies. If you get the chance to get her as a doctor you are going to have a great experience.. Keep up your amazing work because there are not many doctors out there that possess all of your attributes and characteristics.

review: I am a loyal patient of  Dr. Neelam. She is very technical, thorough, nice, and convincing since being a technical person, I researched the consequences and treatments, and she informed me of all the options before I even asked! This instilled a lot of confidence in me, so I decided to let her do what she thinks is best for me.  Besides, the staff is also wonderful!

review: Thank you from the bottom of my heart to Dr. Walia... She supported me from the beginning and gave me so much hope to get through such a hard time during my pregnancy and delivery. Needless to mention my level of anxiety and low confidence after earlier failed pregnancies. She gave us so much confidence during all consultations. Her hand in surgery is excellent as she operated me for my D&C and delivery both.  We are so glad we chose to take this journey with her...

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: From professionalism to punctuality, *** ********* * I would highly suggest anyone journeying through fertility/infertility, have this team care for you! Dr. Neelam takes her time with you, is very informative, and will provide insight on all the possible scenarios/outcomes. Her plans for your care are always thorough and well outlined, I never questioned any of my protocols! Highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I saw Dr Neelam for a d&c following missed abortion. As a nurse who works in fertility I was blown away by how positive this experience was, considering I had a miscarriage. The procedure was quick and completely painless. The Staff was knowledgeable and sensitive and took such good care of me. I honestly cannot recommend Dr Neelam enough. It's extremely obvious why many patients have positive reviews for the Doctor. I will be forever grateful for the kindness and care they showed me.
